name: 24 points
description:
This calculator is used to check if the given 4 digits can somehow (using addition, subtraction, multiplication and division) get 24.

This is a fun brain game to play at any moment, because there are numbers everywhere!

･ᴗ･

You can just take 4 digits from a random car number, and try to get 24!

Ps. You can try to get other numbers as well.

icon from  icons8.com
